## BTC-USD : Bitcoin

1. regression 
2. regression subject to intercept = 0
3. HK test
4. Step1 test
5. Step2 test

```{r, `echo = TRUE`}

library(huxtable)
library(knitr)

#  nn_list
nn_btc   <- list()
nn_alpha <- list()
nn_beta  <- list()
nn_HK    <- list()
nn_st1   <- list()
nn_st2   <- list()


i = 3 #  1-BTC / 2-ETH / 3-BTC+ETH
for (j in 1:3)  {
  nn_btc[[j]] <- nn_list[[i]][[j]][[1]] # regression
  
    ##### regression model_q
  nn_alpha[[j]] <- nn_list[[i]][[j]][[1]]$coefficients[1]   # alpha 
  nn_beta[[j]] <- sum(nn_list[[i]][[j]][[1]]$coefficients) - nn_alpha[[j]]  # beta
  
  nn_HK[[j]] <- nn_list[[i]][[j]][[3]] 
  nn_st1[[j]] <- nn_list[[i]][[j]][[4]] 
  nn_st2[[j]] <- nn_list[[i]][[j]][[5]] 
}



# nn_btc
huxreg(nn_btc)
nn_alpha
kable(nn_alpha)
nn_beta
kable(nn_beta)
nn_HK
nn_st1
nn_st2
 # huxreg(nn_HK)

```
